attacks.name: TLC
attacks.effect: Shuffle 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it and all cards attached to it into their deck.

attacks.name: Ocean Cyclone
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
